rules.description: [UNI][Super Arrow Keys] Super + H => Left, Super + J => Down, Super + K => Up, Super + L => Right
[UNI][Super Home/End and Far-Arrow Keys] Super + N => Home, Super + M => Left_Option + Left, Super + Comma => Left_Option + Right, Super + Priod => End
[UNI][Disable Macos' Home/End ShortCuts] DISABLE Left_Control + N => Home, Left_Control + Priod => End
[UNI][Super Backspace and Delete] Super + U => Backspace, Super + I => Delete (Check 'Use Option as Meta key' in Terminal Profiles Keyboard Setting)
[UNI][Change Input Source] Super(INT)/Left_Command(EXT) + Left_Shift => Left_Control + Space_Bar
[UNI][Quick Symbol (Enter and Tilde)] Quick + Space_Bar => Enter, Quick + Grave_Accent_And_Tilde => ~
[UNI][Quick Symbol (Left Region)] Quick + QWERASDF => <>()[]{}, Quick + TGB => ^=:, Quick + ZXCV => +-*/
[UNI][Quick Symbol (Right Region)] Quick + IO => ?\, Quick + JKL => "'_, Quick + NM => &|
[UNI][Quick Symbol (Number Region / Shift 12345)] Quick + 1 => !, Quick + 2 => @, Quick + 3 => #, Quick + 4 => $, Quick + 5 => %
[UNI][Snipaste] Super(INT)/Left_Command(EXT) + A => Left Command + Left Option + P
[UNI][Chrome History & Download] Easy + H => Left Command + Y, Easy + J => Left Command + Left Option + L
[UNI][AltTab Switch Application] Super(INT)/Left_Command(EXT) + Tab => Left_Control/Left_Command + quote
